mapper.update:
UPDATE JNL_TELLER_TRACE
guid = #{guid,jdbcType=varchar},
instno = #{instno,jdbcType=varchar},
teller_no = #{teller_no,jdbcType=varchar},
chn_code = #{chn_code,jdbcType=varchar},
action_type = #{action_type,jdbcType=varchar},
action_time = #{action_time,jdbcType=varchar},
trans_sno = #{trans_sno,jdbcType=varchar},
trans_code = #{trans_code,jdbcType=varchar},
tws_code = #{tws_code,jdbcType=varchar},
remark_info = #{remark_info,jdbcType=text}
WHERE guid = #{guid}
